summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1733, for the improvement of Bayview Street, from 14th Avenue South to 17th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading, curbing and construction of wooden curbs and gutters, concrete walks and stairways, under Ordinance No. 18370 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
